RelatedSentence: Twenty - six members of treasury and opposition benches tabled a total of 20 privilege motions in the first parliamentary year of the current provincial assembly , of which 16 were referred to the privilege committee .

Only one motion , moved by Azam Khan Durrani , is related to utilisation of funds in his constituency .
